title: Perform Root Cause Analysis (RCA) on Failure
description: Following a major equipment failure, a reliability engineer leads an RCA session to prevent recurrence.

tasks.description: Gather all available data about the failure, including operator logs, maintenance history, and alarm data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully compiles all relevant information.

tasks.description: Use a structured RCA method, like a '5 Whys' or 'Fishbone Diagram', to analyze the data and identify potential causes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team works through the methodology to brainstorm causes.

tasks.description: Identify the most likely root cause and create corrective actions to address it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team determines the root cause was a design flaw and creates a corrective action to redesign the faulty component.
